author.name: Martin Rijntjes
author.title: A Photographer.
author.description: I am a Photograper from the Netherlands, in the corner of Western Europe. I Capture nature, animals, cars and people in their natural habitats.

studio.title: For Hire
studio.description: Would you like to hire me as a photographer for your event or other situation, this is possible.

equipment.title: Equipment
equipment.description: To any situation I bring my own equipment. With this I am able to capture situations from close by to far away with great detail.

print.title: Printing
print.description:
I myself do not have any printing services.
I do have experience with some services available in the Netherlands, maybe I can steer you in the right direction.

focus.title: Focus
focus.description: During shoots I have full focus on delivering the best result with great attention for detail.

pictures.title: Buy a Picture
pictures.description: Would you like to use/buy any of the photographs show on this website or seen elsewhere marked with Air-Global.nl? This is possible.

film.title: Film or Digital
film.description: All pictures taken shall be captured digitally.
